title: I'm No Traitor (with Gavin Shuker)
itunes:title: I'm No Traitor (with Gavin Shuker)
description:
Ex-Labour MP and shadow minister Gavin Shuker talks about standing as an independent against his former colleagues. He tells Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing Jeremy Corbyn is "anti-West" and he can't let his constituents only have the choice of hard Brexit or hard left. Also IFS research economist Ben Zaranko tells Bloomberg Westminster that neither of the two main parties' manifestos stand up to scrutiny in being able to fund the policies they have promised.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Ex-Labour MP and shadow minister Gavin Shuker talks about standing as an independent against his former colleagues. He tells Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing Jeremy Corbyn is "anti-West" and he can't let his constituents only have the choice of hard Brexit or hard left. Also IFS research economist Ben Zaranko tells Bloomberg Westminster that neither of the two main parties' manifestos stand up to scrutiny in being able to fund the policies they have promised.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
